Guys, to keep the timeline of the group clean, kindly create a single post for cover images. Add your images as comments. To vote, like the comment of the cover image you like. No plain-text comments.

Update: Add them to this folder https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=oa.736292163077161&type=1

guys i've an idea about a new activity in our group.

after this post https://www.facebook.com/groups/egyptian.geeks/734993243207053/

i liked that debate between us. so why don't we have something like debates. for example PHP vs Ruby. and get the experts from both side to start the debate. i'll help the group members enhancing their skills. whta do you think guys?!

posts.caption: liquidapsive.com
posts.description: Adaptive is characterized by having defined layouts for different resolutions. Responsive is characterized by having defined layouts for different resolutions.

Microsoft-Nokia deal completes. Microsoft now owns Nokia's complete mobile division including licensing to Nokia's massive patent portfolio, more details will be out next week at financial call.

Welcome to Microsoft Mobile! :D
